query: I need assistance in planning a week-long trip from Myrtle Beach to Texas from March 23rd to March 29th, 2022, for two people. We plan to visit three different cities in Texas. Our budget for this trip is now set at $8,800. Please note, we are bringing along children under 10, so consider accommodations that are child-friendly.
